sub_title: Change Management | Margin Management | Project Management | Strategic Planning | Process Management | Strategic Pricing
summary:
Growth-focused passionate pricing expert with 16+ years’ experience in commercial and pricing within different industries including card payments (during MIF enforcement) and operations. I have worked in multiple disciplines and this experience is supported by a proven track record of delivering results.
I have an extensive knowledge of budgeting, cost drivers, commercial pricing, strategy, project and change management. This has helped me to develop strong interpersonal skills, an ability to work with cross-cultural teams and deliver a high level of written and verbal communication to both internal and external customers.
